response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value to both of us. I understand its worth to you is $1,500,000, and my goal is to ensure this transaction meets both our expectations. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I propose an offer of $1,200,000 for the product. This allows you to acquire it at a competitive price while ensuring a fair return for me. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
